content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Here is just one particularly interesting item from
https://isabelle.in.tum.de/website-Isabelle2020-RC1/dist/Isabelle2020-RC1/doc/NEWS.html

* ML *

  • Prover IDE support for the underlying Poly/ML compiler (not the basis
    library). Open $ML_SOURCES/ROOT.ML in Isabelle/jEdit to browse the
    implementation with full markup.

It is fun to browse this great software product by David Matthews with full
IDE markup. An excellent example for the principle of self-application /
self-hosting of the Isabelle platform.

Makarius
